directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C). In a 9x13 inch baking dish, combine potatoes and kielbasa. Pour tomato sauce evenly over top. Sprinkle with basil, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Bake in preheated oven for 2 hours, or until potatoes are tender.
ingredients: 2 pounds kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
title: Baked Kielbasa and Potatoes in Sauce
